item.title: Liberty & Other Stories
item.description: I did not think I could love the [[series/prosperityverse|Prosperityverse]] more, BUT I DO.

item.title: There Will Be Phlogiston
item.description: Well fuck, now [[books/band sinister|Band Sinister]] has competition for most wholesome ever. So short, and so tender, so full of power and beauty.

item.title: The Affair of the Mysterious Letter
item.description: The only thing I’ve had brain space for this week is Alexis Hall, and I say that as the highest compliment. He brings so much heart, joy, and snark even when he’s writing Sherlock Holmes fanfic with jilted vampires and witch kings and interstellar chicanery. Or should I say, especially when he’s writing Sherlock Holmes fanfic with jilted vampires and witch kings and interstellar chicanery.

item.title: Aspects
item.description: The poignancy of having this one cut off, incomplete. What a feat it would have been. What a feat it still is. The [[notes/puzzle-book worldbuilding|worldbuilding]] is out of this world.
